Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Whether team t is assigned to project p for the planning horizon

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Whether worker w is assigned to team t

Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Whether user story us is scheduled into sprint sp

Name: plan_task_in_sprint_backlog
Description: Whether task k is included in a sprint backlog

Name: select_feature_in_release
Description: Whether feature f is included in a release plan

Name: choose_product_owner_for_backlog
Description: Whether product owner po manages product backlog pb

Name: choose_scrum_master_for_team
Description: Whether scrum master sm supports team t

Name: set_story_priority
Description: Assigned operational priority for a user story

Name: set_task_effort
Description: Planned effort (hours) for a task after refinement

Name: set_team_capacity
Description: Planned capacity (story points) for a team in a sprint

Name: allocate_project_budget
Description: Allocated budget (currency units) to a project

Name: schedule_daily_scrum_time
Description: Start time of Daily Scrum in 24h format (decimal hours)
